attributes.action: , in light of the damage and collapse caused by the Chinese carpet-bagging of Rover, as well as foreign takeover of UK Wind Farms construction licences and pending Kraft takeover of Cadbury financially backed by RBS, ensure that UK jobs will be protected by a new Act of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Proposal for the Cadbury Law:

In light of the damage and collapse caused by the Chinese carpet-bagging of Rover, as well as foreign takeover of UK Wind Farms construction licences and pending Kraft takeover of Cadbury financially backed by RBS, ensure that UK jobs will be protected by a new Act of Parliament.
